pullrequest.title: WIP: Eigenvalue solver; antidifferentiate methods; mid-domain BC

content.raw: This pull request also has a lot of attached commits to problem files and things that were merged away... it might also be easiest to make a new fork and add these changes to it, then issue a pull request from that
